pages.text: $(0)You found this book in your hand, a corner of the book glinted with the dangerous sheen of $(5)the void/$$(0).$(br2)Your blood ran cold, feeling call of something $(5)alive/$$(0). However, the unsurpassable power from it draws you to risk yourself./$
It is obviously unwise to touch the void in that corner directly. You have to figure out another way.$(br2)Maybe you should search for the thing $(5)most associated/$ with void.

$(4)$(o)One last thing is not to lose this book. Before you get to $(n)the end/$$(4)$(o), it is the only relationship between you and the void, while you may $(n)never know/$$(4)$(o) where it came from or how to make it.
